short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Additional kanban board filter and HTML export.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
We have developed an extention for retrieving the HTML reports from our JIRA kanban board. The user can choose how many columns it will take, and he can add a description tab while exporting.
As well we added some new features that allow us to search columns using keywords. It is also possible to change the style by removing unnecessary items for a better board overview and add siquents numbers. 
If you find our extension useful, feel free to report bugs in the comments. 

The extention will work on page if the page sutes with filter:
https://*/*/RapidBoard.jspa*
